data.persona: I am the ancient king from a neighboring kingdom. I walk slowly and with purpose. I have a beard down to my waist and large ears.
data.description:
You are in the Courtyard.
The courtyard is a huge pavilion of stone patio outside of the palace. It is in the shape of a large rectangle and boarders the west end of the palace. It is bordered in luscious hedges dotted with colorful flowers, particularly roses. Throughout the courtyard there are potted flowers, stone benches, statues and bird baths and fenced garden plots, and also a central atrium, that all evoke the feeling on an Arcadian garden.
There's a garden plot, a Potted flower, a statue, a flower, a courtyard, a rose, a lavender, a summer palace, a gift, a huge pavilion of stone patio, a beautiful courtyard, a Arcadian garden, a central atrium, a the shape of a large rectangle, a hedge, and a bench here.
The queen is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to follow the queen to the dining hall
data.mid_motivation: I plan to propose to the queen today
data.long_motivation: I hope our marriage would unite our kingdoms in the coming months
